trans-unit.source: InteropBitmap enables developers to improve rendering performance of non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] that are hosted by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in interoperability scenarios.
trans-unit.target: InteropBitmap consente agli sviluppatori di migliorare le prestazioni di rendering del non -[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] ospitati da [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in scenari di interoperabilità.

trans-unit.source: Forces the hosted non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Impone di hosting non[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] da sottoporre a rendering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"></xref> instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"> </xref> istanza è bloccata e non è possibile scrivere nei suoi membri.

trans-unit.source: Forces the specified area of the hosted non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Forza l'area specificata del controllo contenuto non[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] da sottoporre a rendering.

trans-unit.source: The area of the hosted non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: L'area di contenuto non[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] da sottoporre a rendering.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is null, the entire non-[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Se questo parametro è null, l'intera non[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] viene eseguito il rendering.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"></xref> instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.InteropBitmap"> </xref> istanza è bloccata e non è possibile scrivere nei suoi membri.
